name: uwusome night
description:
Welcome to uwusome night! owo Join me and enjoy my beautiful world. uwu  ... Oh, no...! I'm scared. ywy Do you like pretty things? Then you'll love this game. Live a sensory experience as you complete objectives inside a kawaii style house. Wow, you might even find a surprise or two inside this house.  This game is not for scaredy cats. Controls:
  • W/A/S/D - Move
  • R - Recharge
  • E - Interaction
Design and development

Alcaval - Gameplay Programmer

Virdi22 - Gameplay Programmer

Dededec - Gameplay Programmer / Sound Programmer

Tremov - 3D Modelling/Animation

Hehelozcer (@mashigraphic on Instagram) - 3D Modelling/UI Design/Web Design

Manuel396d - 3D Modelling

JaviBermanBD - Sound Design

Global Jam 2022 Project (Granada, Spain)

Theme: Duality
